title.rendered: CfP: Bigdata Analysis National Conference on NCBA at Hyderabad, India [Hybrid; May 4; Publication Opportunity]: Submit by April 19!

content.rendered:
Submissions are invited for the National Conference on NCBA in Hyderabad, India. The last date for submissions is April 19, 2025.

About the Conference

Join us for the National Conference on Bigdata Analysis (NCBA – 25) in Hyderabad, India, on March 7th, 2023. This event offers a platform for industry professionals and academics to share the latest advancements in big data analysis.

The conference will feature presentations, expert panels, and keynote speeches from global leaders. It provides an excellent opportunity for networking, forming business and research connections, and engaging in high-level discussions, contributing to professional growth and development.

About the Organizer

National Conference is a respected non-profit organization that provides reliable information on international events across various fields, including engineering, medicine, social science, applied science, and management. Our mission is to advance the knowledge and skills of professionals and researchers through engaging events, contributing to the growth of these industries.

Conference Theme and Objective

The central theme of our conference is to address the significant challenges faced by various industries, including engineering, medicine, social science, applied science, and management. Our aim is to unite key stakeholders from these fields to collaborate and develop solutions for these critical issues. Throughout the conference, we will focus on identifying both current and emerging obstacles, and work towards overcoming them through insightful discussions and knowledge-sharing sessions. With a team of international experts, we offer conferences, workshops, and seminars, creating a platform for researchers to share their work and bridging the gap between academic theory and practical application.

Topics

Engineering

  • Image acquisition and Medical Image processing,
  • Pattern Recognition and Analysis,
  • Visualization,
  • Face Recognition and Super-resolution Imaging,
  • 3D and Stereo Imaging,
  • Image Coding and Compression,
  • Image Segmentation,
  • Face Recognition,
  • 3-D and Surface Reconstruction,
  • Analog and Mixed Signal Processing,
  • Array Signal Processing,
  • Audio/Speech Processing and Coding,
  • Digital and Mobile Signal Processing,
  • Statistical and Optical Signal Processing,
  • Data Mining Techniques,
  • Motion Detection,
  • Content-based Image retrieval,
  • Video Signal Processing,
  • Watermarking,
  • Detection and Estimation of Signal Parameters,
  • Signal Identification,
  • Nonlinear Signals and Systems,
  • Face and Gesture,
  • Hardware Implementation for Signal Processing,
  • Higher Order Spectral Analysis,
  • Illumination and Reflectance Modeling,
  • Image and Video Retrieval,
  • Image Processing and Understanding,
  • Image-Based Modeling,
  • Internet Signal Processing,
  • Knowledge Representation and High-Level Vision,
  • Medical Image Analysis,
  • Multidimensional Signal Processing,
  • Multi-view Geometry,
  • Neural Networks and Genetic Algorithms,
  • Object Detection, Recognition and Categorization,
  • Pattern Recognition in New Modalities,
  • PDE for Image Processing,
  • Performance Evaluation,
  • Radar Signal Processing,
  • Remote Sensing,
  • Segmentation,
  • Sensor Array and Multi-channel Processing,
  • Shape Representation,
  • Signal Processing Education,
  • Sonar Signal Processing and Localization,
  • Speech, Audio and Music Processing,
  • Statistic Learning and Pattern Recognition,
  • Text Processing,
  • Time-Frequency/Time-Scale Analysis,
  • Video Analysis and Event Recognition,
  • Video compression and Streaming,
  • Video Surveillance and Monitoring,
  • Cloud Data Recovery,
  • Authorization, identification and authentication,
  • Big Data Forensics,
  • Bigdata security,
  • Biometric authentication,
  • Cryptography and Crypanalysis,
  • Datacenter and Data Security,
  • Digital forensics,
  • Energy and smart grid securities,
  • Hardware, application, and system security,
  • Information assurance and trustworthy,
  • Intrusion and Attack Readiness,
  • Intrusion detection, traffic analysis and decision making of security,
  • IT Convergence security,
  • Mobile security,
  • Network security and malware,
  • Privacy in pervasive sensing,
  • Privacy in social media,
  • Private Cloud Security,
  • Security and Privacy for Cloud Computing,
  • Security and privacy policies,
  • Security architectures, policies, and regulations,
  • Security coding and engineerings,
  • Security modeling and vulnerability analysis,
  • Trust and Policy Management,
  • Usable security,
  • Web security

Author Guidelines

Abstract Submission:

  • Submit an original work for consideration at any of our conferences
  • The abstract should clearly describe the original work being presented
  • The abstract should be written in English, one paragraph with a word limit of 200-250 words
  • Include a brief biography of the presenting author
  • Submit the abstract in MS Word (.doc or .docx) format
  • Submit the abstract here and receive acknowledgement of receipt via email within three working days
  • The title, author’s name, and affiliations should be centered, with the presenting author’s name underlined

Full Paper Submission:

  • Only for researchers and professionals whose abstracts have been accepted and who have paid the registration cost
  • The total number of pages must be 6-8 in double-column format
  • The manuscript must be written in English and checked for grammar and language errors
  • Tables, figures, and images should be properly named and of high quality
  • Keywords should be written in lowercase letters (except for names/scientific names) and separated with commas
  • Include names of affiliations, including the country
  • The paper should include: Background, Motivation and Objective, Statement of Contribution/Methods, Results, Discussions, and Conclusions
  • Submit the full paper here after preparing it according to the guidelines

Registration

Important Dates

How to Register?

Interested participants can register through this link.

Deadline

The deadline for submission is April 19, 2025.

Click here to view the official notification of Bigdata Analysis National Conference on NCBA at Hyderabad, India.
